mapper.select: select SPCODE, NAME, RESERVE, SPNUMBER, OPER, OPERTIME, SELLAREA, CONTACT1, PHONE1, STATE, CORPPROP, WQYCODE, SPSTATUS, TYPE, AGENTCOUNT, DAYNUM, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, IVRCOUNT, FAXCOUNT, SERVICETYPE, FEE, SAVING, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ASSIGNFLAG, MANUFACTUREAREA, ADDRESS, LINKMAN, TEL, EMAIL, LOGO from DB_SPBASE where SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
